scripts.www: cd www && mkdir -p __/firebase && curl -SLsf https://${PROJECT?}.firebaseapp.com/__/firebase/init.js -o __/firebase/init.js && polymer serve -H 0.0.0.0
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase --project=${PROJECT?} deploy --force && cd appengine && gcloud --project=${PROJECT?} app deploy --version=ci app.yaml cron.yaml
